screeningSummary: Topic-switcher - claimed UFO, actually saw seven-foot bipedal creature with green eyes in woods

textVariants.text: You're on the air. Said you had a UFO sighting?
Alright, you're on. Said you had a UFO sighting?
YOU ARE ON THE AIR! UFO sighting! Tell us everything!
You're on. Let me guess - lights in the sky?
You're on. So you had a UFO sighting?
Oh good, a UFO caller! What's your story?
You're on. Describe your UFO observation from the beginning.

dialogue.speaker: Caller
dialogue.text: I have to be honest, Vern. I said UFOs to get past screening, but that's not what I actually saw.

textVariants.text: Alright, I appreciate the honesty. What did you actually see?
Oh... okay. What did you actually see?
WAIT - you're being HONEST?! I LOVE this already! What did you actually see?!
Oh for... you lied to get through. What did you actually see?
Lied to get on. Fine. What did you actually see?
You're being HONEST! This is GREAT! What did you actually see?!
Topic misrepresentation acknowledged. What phenomenon did you actually observe?

dialogue.speaker: Caller
dialogue.text: I was out in the woods last Tuesday, about 3 AM, hoping to catch some unusual lights. Instead, I heard something crashing through the brush.

textVariants.text: In the woods at 3 AM. And you saw something?
In the woods at 3 AM... okay, what'd you see?
IN THE WOODS at 3 AM! This is getting GOOD! What did you see?!
In the woods at 3 AM. Let me guess - something scary?
In the woods at 3 AM. What'd you see?
CRASHING through the brush at 3 AM! This is PERFECT! What was it?!
Woodland environment, 3 AM. Describe the auditory and visual phenomena encountered.

dialogue.speaker: Caller
dialogue.text: Bipedal. At least seven feet tall. Covered in dark, matted fur. It broke through the tree line maybe forty feet from me and just... stood there. Looking at me.

textVariants.text: Seven feet tall, bipedal, fur. Could've been a bear standing on its hind legs. They do that sometimes.
Seven feet... alright, could've been a bear standing up. You know how it is...
SEVEN FEET TALL, BIPEDAL, FURRY! This is INCREDIBLE! Bear, maybe?!
Seven feet tall, bipedal. Of course it was. Bear standing up, right?
Seven feet. Could be a bear. What's your take?
SEVEN FEET OF TERRIFYING GLORY! Bear, you think?!
Seven foot bipedal organism with fur covering. What distinguishing characteristics ruled out Ursus arctos horribilis in upright posture?

dialogue.speaker: Caller
dialogue.text: I've lived here my whole life, Vern. I've seen bears. This had shoulders like a person. And its eyes reflected green in my flashlight. Like a predator.

textVariants.text: Appreciate you coming clean about the topic. Don't lie to get through next time, but this is legitimate. Set up a trail camera if you can.
Yeah, don't lie to get through next time. But this is legit. Get a camera. Thanks.
THIS IS AMAZING! Don't lie to get on next time but THIS IS REAL! Get a CAMERA!
Right, well... don't lie to get through next time. But this is actually interesting. Camera. Thanks.
Good report. Don't lie to get on next time. Get a camera. Thanks.
This is PERFECT! Don't lie to get on but WE BELIEVE YOU! Get a CAMERA!
Honesty regarding topic is appreciated. Please document future encounters with trail camera placement. Misrepresentation undermines the research process. Thank you for your report.

dialogue.speaker: Caller
dialogue.text: Already ordered one. Thanks for hearing me out, Vern. Sorry about the UFO thing.
